name: PakizəRobot
description: Azərbaycanca olan çox funksiyalı qrup idarə botu.

API_ID.description: Telethon bazalı modullar üçün my.telegram.org adresindən Api ID alın.

API_HASH.description: Telethon bazalı modullar üçün my.telegram.org adresindən Api Hash alın

SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI.description: postgres sql db, boş buraxa bilərsiniz.

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: Botunuzn Support qrupunun linki @ işarəsi olmadan. Öz qrupunuzu eliyin Pakizənin qrup linkini yox.

JOIN_LOGGER.description: Botun əlavə olunduğu qruplar bu kanalda/qrupda saxlanılacaq

CASH_API_KEY.description: Valyuta modulu üçün API key. https://www.alphavantage.co/support/#api-key adresindən alın

TIME_API_KEY.description: Timezone modulu üçün API key. https://timezonedb.com/api adresindən alın

DEV_USERS.description: Bot developer'lərinin ID. Əgər yoxdursa hazırki ID ləri dəyişməyin.

STRICT_GBAN.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.

DRAGONS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as sudo users.

DEMONS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you wanna assign as support users(gban perms only).

TIGERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you wanna assign as tiger users.

WOLVES.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as whitelisted - can't be banned with your bot.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables. Leave it as it is

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks. If you dont know how this works leave it as it is

PORT.description: Port to use for your webhooks. Better leave this as it is on heroku

No_LOAD.description: Dont load these modules cause they shit, space separation

BL_CHATS.description: List of chats you want blacklisted.

ALLOW_EXCL.description: Set this to True if you want ! to be a command prefix along with /. Recommended is True

DONATION_LINK.description: Optional: link where you would like to receive donations. If you are a noob, better leave it linking to paul

DEL_CMDS.description: Set this to True if you want to delete command messages from users who don't have the perms to run that command.

AI_API_KEY.description: Make your bot talk using Intellivoid's chatbot API, get your key from https://coffeehouse.intellivoid.net/

BAN_STICKER.description: ID of the sticker you want to use when banning people.

WALL_API.description: Required for wallpaper. Get your's from https://wall.alphacoders.com/
